thread.section_title: Cult Pens Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.cultpens.com
thread.title: Sally-Ann M
thread.title_full: Cult Pens reviewed by Sally-Ann M

author: Sally-Ann M
title: Sally-Ann M
text: This was my first purchase from cult pens, I purchased a calligraphy starter set and it had a great selection of products. It gave me a chance to try some brands I had heard of but didn't know where to start and also provided excellent value for money... oh and the haribo... nice touch when opening the package and trying all my new pens to have a treat to eat!
